磈字的基本解释

磈
kuǐ
〔磈磊〕ａ．（石）高低不平，如“萧条疾帆流，磈磈冲波白。”ｂ．喻郁积在心中的气愤或愁闷，如“不用浇磈磈，我怀无不平。”均亦作“磈礧”。

磈
wěi
〔磈硊〕（山石）突兀险峻。
高峻：“苍苍中条山，厥形极奇磈。”

磈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wěi］
［《廣韻》於鬼切，上尾，影。］
(1)见“磈硊”。
(2)高峻貌。
(3)见“磈氏”。
[②]［kuǐ］
［《廣韻》口猥切，上賄，溪。］
(1)见“磈2磊”。
(2)见“磈2磥”。
[③]［kuài］
量词。用同“块”。

磈字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　磈； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页834第24
【唐韻】【集韻】?於鬼切，音嵔。山名。【水經注】麗山之西，川中有阜，名曰風涼。原在磈山之隂。　又神名。【山海經】西山長留山，實惟員神磈氏之宮。　又【廣韻】磈硊，石山貌。又危也。　又口猥切，音傀。磈礧，石也。

磈字的起名意思

暂无。

rocky
Basic explanation of words
rocky
kuǐ
[Zhou Lei] a. (Stone) unevenness, such as "depression swiftly sails, and rushing waves white." b. Yu Yu's anger or depression accumulated in his heart, such as "I don't need to pour 磈磈, I have no uneventfulness." All are also referred to as "磈礧".
rocky
wěi
〔磈硊〕(Mountains) is abrupt and steep.
Gao Jun: "Cangcang Zhongtiao Mountain has an extremely strange shape."
rocky
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wěi］
["Guangyun" Yu Guiqie, upper tail, shadow. ]
(1) See "磈硊".
(2) High and steep appearance.
(3) See "Zhou Shi".
[②]［kuǐ］
["Guangyun" has a vague tongue, bribes, and streams. ]
(1) See "Liao 2 Lei".
(2) See "磈2磥".
[③]［kuài］
quantifier. Use the same "block".
rocky
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Stone Character Department] 　磈; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 834 24
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Yu Guiqie, sound 嵔. Mountain name. [Notes on Water Classics] To the west of Lishan, there is Fu in the middle of Sichuan, and the name is wind and cool. Originally in the shadow of Qiaoshan.　Also the name of God. [Shanhaijing] Xishan Changliushan is actually the palace of the gods.　[Guangyun] 磈硊, the appearance of a rocky mountain. It's also dangerous.　It's mouth-cutting, sound puppet. Shao, Shi Ye.
rocky
